attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: After it took several day to download and I finally got on it kicked me out and deleted half of the apps on my phone I hade to get them all back and log back into all of them, long story short I deleted the app because I was to scared to open it again in fear of my apps being deleted.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRID
attributes.review: first this app wouldn’t open then once it did it would crash after only 3 seconds 😩 after i deleted it i began getting death threats to me and my family forcing me to re-download. i had to move from my past address, get a new phone, and change my phone number because of this app. DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: the worst app on the apple store
attributes.review: if i could give zero stars i would. this app took several hours to download. gave my phone glitches and killed my battery. this should get taken off the app store. i would never get this kinda app again if they try to fix the bugs i still wouldn’t get it. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. 🤢

attributes.title: Worst app ever and a waist of time😤😡
attributes.review: This app asked for my location and phone number the next day I got a notification from my safety app saying it was tracking my location next thing I know there’s a creepy trump van following me with cardboard in its Windows the app didn’t even work and kept shutting down worst app font get ❤️

attributes.title: Horrible app. 🤏🏼
attributes.review: I wanted to see what being a braindead trump supporter was like and it is very childish he asked me for his phone number when he is currently married after that it kept on freezing my phone then it crashed and I had to restart my whole phone then I was able to delete the piece of garbage👁👄👁

attributes.title: absolute worst app ever created
attributes.review: There was no way a STABLE GENIUS could ever be behind this app. When I downloaded this app my entire phone screen began fading into this orange tint. Every time I try to type “huge” now, it autocorrects to “yuge.” All of the written content is in broke sentences and does not exceed a 2nd grade reading level. Would never recommend this to anyone.

attributes.title: Had to buy a new phone
attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful!!! I downloaded it and the minute I opened it some sort of virus was downloaded onto my phone and it just went completely black!! Would not recommend this awful app or the person behind it for literally anything

Once I downloaded the app it immediately made my phone go crazy. A tiny monkey woman jumped out of my phone and personally slapped my eyeball. My phone started flying all over my room and changing a weird curse to try and make me vote for trump. I tried to get it down and it bit me. This app is an unacceptable excuse of an app at all. Ps. (The monkey woman won’t leave) DONT TRUST THIS APP!

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review: This app has caused so many crashes on my phone. It took 3 hours to download and I got so mad. I downloaded this app to see what news trump was saying. Every single news is inaccurate and it’s not what’s happening in the world. All of the covid stats are highly false and same with other things. I strongly to not download this app.

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app was very glitchy when it first opened. So bad that I had to get a new phone because it hacked my phone. Now i am being sent to a correctional facility since my whole life was hacked ! My family has nothing and this app has scared me. Not only that but when an app takes 2 days to download too.
